title: Least cost combination of capital and labor

content.question: Assume a firm uses only two inputs, capital (K) and labor (L), to produce its output. Let the marginal product of capital be MPK , the marginal product of labor be MPL , the price of capital be PK , and the price of labor be PL . The least-cost combination of capital and labor needed to produce a given level of output is given by which of the following?
